articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
🎯


DeFi Educator: 1) BTC pumps >$40k
2) Sidelineoors now need to bet more to make it 
3) traders who caught the pump take profit and roll them over into the altcoin casino
4) Money flows from BTC -> Alts = altseason 
5) BTC+ETH dominance chart makes a lower low

On the Price multiplier effect for #Bitcoin, we can look at how much capital flows into the Realized Cap per unit change in Market cap.
We estimate a multiplier effect of around 4-5x by this model using on-chain data.
cc @yassineARK @adam3us 
https://insights.glassnode.com/the-realized-cap-foundation/
